languages.text: "Я не бывал там ранее, но предполагаю, что святая реликвия реактора, окажись она в руках еретиков, способна на великие разрушения. Ярость высвободившихся {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g}, выплеснувшись из священного контура, уничтожит все вокруг. Возможно, что полученные повреждения будут несовместимы с существованием жизни на мире Райкад Минорис".

traits.locale_text: "Я не бывал там ранее, но предполагаю, что святая реликвия реактора, окажись она в руках еретиков, способна на великие разрушения. Ярость высвободившихся {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g}, выплеснувшись из священного контура, уничтожит все вокруг. Возможно, что полученные повреждения будут несовместимы с существованием жизни на мире Райкад Минорис".

languages.text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."
languages.original_text: "Я не бывал там ранее, но предполагаю, что святая реликвия реактора, окажись она в руках еретиков, способна на великие разрушения. Ярость высвободившихся {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g}, выплеснувшись из священного контура, уничтожит все вокруг. Возможно, что полученные повреждения будут несовместимы с существованием жизни на мире Райкад Минорис".

traits.locale_text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretics' hands. The fury of the loose {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around it. The damage that will then be inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris no longer habitable."

The fury of the loose {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around it. The damage that will then be inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris no longer habitable."

The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

"I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

languages.text: "Ich war noch nie dort, würde aber vermuten, dass das heilige Relikt des Reaktors zu gewaltiger Zerstörung fähig ist, sollte es in die Hände von Ketzern geraten. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} aus dem heiligen Schaltkreis gerissen werden, wird ihr Zorn alles um sie herum zerstören. Der Schaden, der dabei entsteht, könnte dafür sorgen, dass die Welt Rykad Minoris nicht länger bewohnbar ist."
languages.original_text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war noch nie dort, würde aber vermuten, dass das heilige Relikt des Reaktors zu gewaltiger Zerstörung fähig ist, sollte es in die Hände von Ketzern geraten. Wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} aus dem heiligen Schaltkreis gerissen werden, wird ihr Zorn alles um sie herum zerstören. Der Schaden, der dabei entsteht, könnte dafür sorgen, dass die Welt Rykad Minoris nicht länger bewohnbar ist."

languages.text: « Je ne me suis encore jamais rendu là-bas, mais j'imagine que la relique sacrée du réacteur pourrait faire de terribles ravages si elle tombait entre les mains des hérétiques. En s'échappant du circuit sacré, la fureur des {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} libérés détruirait tout ce qui se trouve alentour. L'importance des dégâts occasionnés pourrait rendre le monde de Rykad Minoris inhabitable. »
languages.original_text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne me suis encore jamais rendu là-bas, mais j'imagine que la relique sacrée du réacteur pourrait faire de terribles ravages si elle tombait entre les mains des hérétiques. En s'échappant du circuit sacré, la fureur des {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} libérés détruirait tout ce qui se trouve alentour. L'importance des dégâts occasionnés pourrait rendre le monde de Rykad Minoris inhabitable. »

languages.text: “我从来没去过那边，但我认为，如果神圣反应堆落入了异端分子手中，它恐怕会造成巨大的破坏。一旦愤怒的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}从神圣电路中释放出来，反应堆就会将周围的一切尽数摧毁，小莱卡德会变得不再适宜居住。”
languages.original_text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: “我从来没去过那边，但我认为，如果神圣反应堆落入了异教徒手中，它恐怕会造成巨大的破坏。一旦愤怒的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}从神圣电路中释放出来，反应堆就会将周围的一切尽数摧毁，小莱卡德可能不再适宜居住。”

languages.text: 「私は訪れたことはないが、リアクターの聖遺物が異端者の手に渡れば、大きな破滅をもたらすと推測される。一度神聖な回路から解き放たれてしまうと、解放された{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}の怒りは周りの全てのものを破壊するだろう。その被害の大きさは、ライカド・ミノリスの惑星がもはや住める場所ではなくなるほどかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: 「私は訪れたことはないが、リアクターの聖遺物が異端者の手に渡れば、大きな破滅をもたらすと推測される。一度神聖な回路から解き放たれてしまうと、解放された{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}の怒りは周りの全てのものを破壊するだろう。その被害の大きさは、ライカド・ミノリスの惑星がもはや住める場所ではなくなるほどかもしれない」

languages.text: «Nunca he estado allí, pero presumo que la reliquia sagrada del reactor es capaz de causar una gran destrucción si acaba en manos de herejes. La furia de los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} al ser liberados del circuito sagrado destruirá todo a su alrededor. Los daños infligidos pueden hacer que el mundo de Rykad Minoris quede inhabitable».
languages.original_text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca he estado allí, pero presumo que la reliquia sagrada del reactor es capaz de causar una gran destrucción si acaba en manos de herejes. La furia de los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} al ser liberados del circuito sagrado destruirá todo a su alrededor. Los daños infligidos pueden hacer que el mundo de Rykad Minoris deje de ser habitable».

languages.text: "Oraya hiç gitmedim fakat sanıyorum ki kutsal reaktörün yadigârı kâfirlerin eline düşerse çok büyük bir yıkıma sebebiyet verebilir. Kutsal devreden kurtulup serbest kalan {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhlarının{/g} hiddeti, çevrelerindeki her şeyi yok edecektir. Oluşacak hasarın boyutu, Rykad Minoris dünyasını yaşama elverişsiz hâle getirebilir."
languages.original_text: "I have never been there before, but I would presume that the sacred relic of the reactor is capable of great destruction should it end up in heretic hands. The fury of the freed {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}, once released from the sacred circuit, will destroy everything around them. The degree of damage inflicted may render the world of Rykad Minoris uninhabitable."

traits.locale_text: "Oraya hiç gitmedim fakat sanıyorum ki kutsal reaktörün yadigârı kâfirlerin eline düşerse çok büyük bir yıkıma sebebiyet verebilir. Kutsal devreden kurtulup serbest kalan {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g}nın hiddeti, çevrelerindeki her şeyi yok edecektir. Oluşacak hasarın boyutu, Rykad Minoris dünyasını yaşama elverişsiz hâle getirebilir."
